item.title: Cara Install Golang di Linux
item.description: My Device Linux Ubuntu 14.04 Run this command ! cd ~ wget https://dl.google.com/go/go1.13.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz tar -xf go1.13.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz export GOROOT="/home/$USER/go" export GOPATH="/home/$USER/go/packages" export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin:$GOPATH/bin # puts export line to your ~/.bashrc or any bashprofile file THAT’S IT By the way, checkout one of best Brian song
